articles.author: The Associated Press, Nicole Acevedo
articles.title: Tragic milestone as Covid-19 deaths eclipse 700,000 in U.S. - NBC News
articles.description: The U.S. death toll from Covid-19 eclipsed 700,000 late Friday. The last 100,000 deaths occurred during a time when vaccines were available to almost every American.
articles.content:
Its a milestone that by all accounts didnt have to happen this soon.
The U.S. death toll from Covid-19 eclipsed 700,000 late Friday a number greater than the population of Boston. The last 100,000 d… [+7316 chars]

articles.title: Battle for abortion rights hits America’s streets - NEWS.com.au
articles.description: Carrying signs with slogans like "my body, my choice, my right" thousands of women rallied Saturday in Washington at the start of a day of nationwide protests aimed at countering a conservative drive to restrict access to abortions.

articles.title: American, Alaska Airlines and JetBlue will require employee vaccinations : Coronavirus Updates - NPR
articles.description: The three airlines are joining United in mandating that workers be vaccinated against COVID-19, as the Biden administration steps up pressure on major U.S. carriers to require the shots.
articles.content:
Travelers watch a JetBlue aircraft taxi away from a gate at Ronald Reagan Washington National Airport on May 25.

articles.title: The Latest: More US airlines requiring employee vaccinations - North Shore News
articles.description: WASHINGTON — President Joe Biden mourned “the painful milestone” of 700,000 American deaths from COVID-19, a day after the U.S. surpassed that mark on Friday.
